attributes.action: Introduce a Vaccine Bill to Rights to protect citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure rules now being considered do not contradict the Nuremburg medical code or the established principle of "my body, my choice"
attributes.background:
The Vaccine Bill of Rights should affirm in law that: 
▪	Individuals themselves determine what's in their own best medical interest without threat to livelihood or freedom of movement.
▪	Mandating or coercing medication or experimental medication for any person is always illegal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801

It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.
